summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 629 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1579 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4237 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 628.6m lower than yesterday, 541.2m lower than the past week, 1578.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1095.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and very little to no wind will be present. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
